properties.entry: select stl.*,st.name as TAG_NAME, (select name from sc_user where login_id = stl.creator) as CREATOR_NAME, (select name from sc_user where login_id = stl.logor) as LOGOR_NAME from sc_tag_log stl , sc_tag st where st.id = stl.tag_id and stl.entity_id = '{@#entityId#}' and stl.entity_type = '{@#entityType#}' order by stl.no desc
